company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tập Đoàn Đầu Tư Địa Ốc No Va
job_description:
Mô tả Công việc
1. Soát xét, quản lý lưu trữ hồ sơ hiệu quả
Tiếp nhận & trình ký hồ sơ, hỗ trợ chuyển giao hồ sơ cho các Phòng ban theo line phân quyền.
Phân loại hồ sơ, kiểm soát hình thức văn bản, kiểm tra chứng từ nhằm đảm bảo tính chính xác về thủ tục & quy trình theo phân quyền phê duyệt.
Lưu trữ toàn bộ hồ sơ của các dự án, bao gồm: hồ sơ pháp lý, thiết kế, thi công, hợp đồng, thanh toán,... (hardcopy và softcopy theo yêu cầu), đảm bảo hồ sơ không bị thất lạc và được truy xuất dễ dàng (nếu cần).
Thường xuyên rà soát hệ thống quản lý hồ sơ và đưa ra cải tiến đổi mới
2. Thanh toán, theo dõi chi phí & quản lý ngân sách hoạt động
Lập PYC mua hàng hóa - dịch vụ phục vụ hoạt động của phòng ban (IT, ADM, các PYC về hoạt động ).
Hỗ trợ quản lý lập và quản lý ngân sách.
Thực hiện tất cả hồ sơ thanh toán - tạm ứng (công tác, tiếp khách, mua hàng hóa – dịch vụ - thuê văn phòng).
Theo dõi thanh toán các chi phí hoạt động phục vụ cho dự án (pháp lý, PCCC, DTM...)
Kiểm soát việc tuân thủ nội qui lao động cho các nhân viên trong phòng ban; chấm công hằng tháng.
3. Truyền đạt và cập nhật thông tin
Phụ trách theo dõi, đôn đốc các hồ sơ tại các cơ quan ban ngành theo sự phân công của Trưởng phòng ban.
Theo dõi, đôn đốc công việc của các team thuộc phòng ban; Tổng hợp báo cáo công việc hàng tuần.
Đầu mối tiếp nhận thông tin từ các phòng ban khác, xin ý kiến trưởng phòng ban triển khai cho phòng hoặc trực tiếp thực hiện, tổng hợp gửi phản hồi cho các phòng ban yêu cầu.
requirements:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Quản trị văn phòng, Nhân sự,...
Từ 03-05 năm vị trí quản lý hành chính văn phòng
Nghiệp vụ thư ký, văn thư lưu trữ, ngoại ngữ
Kiến thức về hành chánh, quản lý hồ sơ
Có kiến thức về bất động sản
Hiệu quả, Chính trực, Chuyên nghiệp.
Đặc tính Novator & Cơ chế đánh giá Nhân sự.
Có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao trong công việc

The Warehouse Data System Specialist/ Supervisor is responsible for managing and optimizing data systems that support warehouse operations. This role ensures accurate data flow between warehouse systems, ERP, K2, PMMS and reporting tools to improve operational efficiency and inventory accuracy. The Warehouse Data System Specialist is also responsible for making the warehouse monthly report and controlling warehouse management system.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES
• Monitor and analyze warehouse data related to inventory, transactions, and system performance.
• Maintain and support warehouse data systems, ensuring data accuracy and integrity.
• Responsible for amending, adding and updating the warehouse management procedure on the system
• Ensure data is entered into the system accurately and on time to facilitate management reporting.
• Responsible for planning and executing the daily internal audit inventory and reviewing the warehouse process and procedure.
• Responsible for making Warehouse KPIs reporting to the manager on a monthly.
• Develop reports and dashboards to support warehouse productivity and KPIs.
• Working with warehouse operation to identify opportunities for process optimization
• Warehouse people management and effective communication with partners
• Completed other duties as assigned.

Strong skills in data management, reporting, and database tools (Power BI, Excel, .Power Query)
